item.title: By: AiM Oil Pressure Sensor – not4kds

item.description: […] oil pressure sensor was leftover as unfinished business after I picked up the car from Marcus back in June. The factory Mazda oil pressure sensor was removed and we thought we could plug in the OEM GM […]
item.content:encoded: […] oil pressure sensor was leftover as unfinished business after I picked up the car from Marcus back in June. The factory Mazda oil pressure sensor was removed and we thought we could plug in the OEM GM […]

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/06/fine-tunes-and-tweaks/#comment-108343">Phillip Shinele</a>.
Thanks. To answer your question, I leave the car in the hands of a pro instead. I used to do all the work when I had more time... but I've gotten busier and the projects I've undertaken have grew grander.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Phillip Shinele.

Thanks. To answer your question, I leave the car in the hands of a pro instead. I used to do all the work when I had more time… but I’ve gotten busier and the projects I’ve undertaken have grew grander.

item.title: By: Phillip Shinele
item.dc:creator: Phillip Shinele
item.description: Been following your page for quite a a while and very impressed with all of the work. I have a fd with a single turbo conversion and lately I've been working a lot and wonder how you have free time to work on yours haha. When you are ready to sell this one, I call dibs :)
item.content:encoded: Been following your page for quite a a while and very impressed with all of the work. I have a fd with a single turbo conversion and lately I’ve been working a lot and wonder how you have free time to work on yours haha. When you are ready to sell this one, I call dibs :)

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/06/fine-tunes-and-tweaks/#comment-107769">Danny Y.</a>.
Never drove a S2000!
The clutch feels similar to the FD one, at least when I upgraded the pressure plate to the ACT. It's relatively heavy, which I like.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Danny Y..

Never drove a S2000!

The clutch feels similar to the FD one, at least when I upgraded the pressure plate to the ACT. It’s relatively heavy, which I like.

item.title: By: Danny Y.
item.dc:creator: Danny Y.
item.description: looking good! how is the clutch compared to a s2000?
item.content:encoded: looking good! how is the clutch compared to a s2000?
